Title: The Anachronism
Description:
Insert the batteries into the cylindrical holes on the console.

Then, titans willing, we will see what it holds.
ObjectivesText: Activate the Excavated Console and use the device to defeat the Sargassum Guardian in Golgrin's Reach.
PortraitGiverText: This fusion of sand and sea is empowered with ancient titan bracers.
CompletionText:
To obtain the power necessary, find an elemental of sufficient size to charge the artifact.

If I am right, the titan artifact will do the rest.
RewardText:
Curious. It is emitting a signal I have seen before.

I have an idea where this may lead us.
